channel.title: blog on Fumbles and stumbles with StatusHat
channel.description: Recent content in blog on Fumbles and stumbles with StatusHat

item.title: Switcharoo
item.description: I finally gave up grappling with Ruby versions, Jekyll versions and containers and stuff. After a pleasant test drive with the Hugo static site generator, I decided to take a big leap and switch over. I also decided to start as barebones as possible, making my own theme as I go. Hopefully I’ll expose myself to lots of fun learning opportunities.

item.title: Not much except excerpts
item.description: I figured out how to include excerpts of blog posts on the front page/post list. Hopefully, it doesn’t look quite as spartan and sad now.
